name: English alphabet for kids
description: Cards are an easy and funny way for learing. An indispensable tool for parents to learn words with children. Perfect for kids of any age.  + NEW Game!  To teach children English cards easy and interesting for the child. Just start playing with it, showing different sets of cards. Each card includes a picture, a translation of the English word and transcription, as well as sound. The app has many categories like:  Animals  Fruits and vegetables  Profession  Furniture  Transport  Equipment  Growing with us
